fields.name: The Mines of Moria
fields.description: Sauron's forces are threatening the land. Messengers sent to deliver a message to the southern kingdom have gone missing in the Mines of Moria. You must deliver the message, or all is lost!
fields.intro_text:
It is a bad time for the free people. The forces of the dark lord, Sauron, are swarming over the world. Armies of orcs, trolls, and evil men and beasts are strengthening the shadow that will soon envelop the earth.

For the moment, the land of the west (which you are on) is protected by the Misty Mountains, which Sauron is not yet ready to cross. But you, the Main Hall, and the free lands and people of the west are not safe! The men of the south, who have been fighting bravely against the Dark Lord, cannot hold out for long against Sauron and his growing power.

But there is hope. At great risk, a wizard and his ranger companion smuggled information out of Sauron's fortress which could be of great use to the men in the south.

They could not deliver the information right away, so they waited at the Main Hall. When they finally set out, all paths through the Misty Mountains were blocked due to winter storms.

Realizing that Sauron would stop them if they tried to take any normal paths, the two men decided to take a path that the Dark Lord would never think of watching... because the way is more terrible than his army!

The path they chose was... THE MINES OF MORIA!

---

Built by the dwarves long, long ago, "Khazad-Dum" (The Halls of the Dwarves) became the center of dwarfdom. Skilled dwarvish miners built a kingdom under the Misty Mountains. The mines produced immeasurable amounts of gold, silver, iron, jewels, and most importantly, mithril (the most valuable metal on earth)!

But the dwarves dug too deep, and awoke evil things far below the earth. Many dwarves were slain, and the rest were forced to flee. The doors were shut, and Khazad-Dum was renamed "Moria" - The Black Chasm.

After beginning their journey into Moria, the wizard and ranger were never heard from again.

However, the wizard left a copy of the information with the bartender at the Main Hall, telling him that if he was not heard from to give it to a tough and trustworthy adventurer to take it to the men of the south.

(In case you haven't figured it out yet, the bartender is sending you on the mission!)

You read the letter. It says:

> If you are reading this, then I have failed. Your mission is perilous and difficult. You will enter Moria from the west, survive in Moria, and find the exit, 'East-Gate', on the other side of the mountains.
>
> Once there, you must deliver this letter to friends.
> 
> Elbereth

The rest of the letter is written in a strange language which you cannot read and the letter is signed with a strange rune which seems to be a "G".

May the Valar be with you!

fields.name: You are on the old road. (N/S)
fields.description: To the north is the Main Hall. To the south the path continues. Thick brush stops you from going east or west.

fields.name: You are on the old road. (N/S/E)
fields.description: The main road continues north and south. To the south is an encampment of thieves; too many to fight. An eastbound path cuts through the forest, headed for the Misty Mountains. The dense forest blocks passage to the west.

fields.name: You are on a plateau. (W)
fields.description: You are on a plateau in the mountains. To the north and south are cliff edges. A cliff wall rises in front of you (to the east). There is a path west. You see a dark pool of water.

fields.name: You are on some stairs going down to the east. (E)
fields.description: You are on stairs going down. The door to the west is slammed shut by the Watcher in the Water. You are stuck in Moria.

fields.name: You are at an intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: It is very dark. If not for the staff, you would not be able to see.

fields.name: You are in a small guard post. (N)
fields.description: There's lots of junk and garbage scattered about here.

fields.name: You are at a four way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a light to the south.

fields.name: You are in a blocked tunnel. (S)
fields.description: A cave-in to the north prevents travel that way. There are many spider webs hanging from the ceiling.

fields.name: You are in a passage. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a north/south passage. There is a light to the south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (N/W)
fields.description: You can go north or west. There is a light to the west.

fields.name: You are in an orc headquarters. (E)
fields.description: There is a desk in the center. This place looks like a small headquarters.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable dark tunnel.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You see a gate to the north. A deep crack cuts you off from the tunnel to the east, but you can probably jump over it.

fields.name: You are in a large, fancy chamber. (E)
fields.description: This large room was once decorated in fine stonework, much of which now lies in pieces on the floor. Still, you feel a sense of grandeur here, which is missing from most of the mines. A doorway leads east.

fields.name: You are in Durin's chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a large room. The walls are made of gold. In the center, upon a platform of silver, next to a large box made of mithril, lies a diamond coffin. Words below it say, "Here sleeps Durin the Deathless". A door leads east.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: The sides of the walls are very smooth. To the west, a deep crack cuts you off from the rest of the tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: The sides of the tunnel are rough. There is a small room to the south. You notice that there is a trap door to the east, and it isn't very far across.

fields.name: You are in a pit. (U)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a pit. You don't see a way back up to the tunnel you were in, but you can climb out on the other side. That way seems to take you deeper into the mines.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/D)
fields.description: There is a board across the eastern tunnel. You see the word "DANGER!" written in Orcish on it. Another tunnel leads west, but passage in that direction is blocked by a deep pit in the floor. You could climb down into the pit if you wanted to.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of some stairs. (E/U)
fields.description: Stone stairs lead up toward the elevator. A dark tunnel leads east. It is warm on this level.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south, you see a board on the ground that looks as if it had fallen from being across the south doorway.

fields.name: You are at a bend. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a bend in the passage. It goes west and south. There is a room to the east.

fields.name: You are in a mining storage room. (W)
fields.description: This room has been abandoned for many years and everything here is old and worn.

fields.name: You are at a bend. (N/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend. You can go north or east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You can go east, west, or south. There is a very faint light to the south.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: There is light to the south, and you hear a noise from that direction...

fields.name: You are in a large cave. (N)
fields.description: You are in a huge cave. It is lit by a window hundreds of feet up.

fields.name: You are at an intersection. (N/W)
fields.description: There is a long tunnel to the west. To the north you see some mining carts.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You see a gate south. You also see some useless mining carts here.

fields.name: You are in a mine tunnel. (W)
fields.description: It looks like orcs have been here. This must be one of the fabled dwarven mines. There is a big "X" on the wall here.

fields.name: You are a T-intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an intersection. The tunnels here are ancient, but the ruins show fine Dwarven craftsmanship. Tunnels lead north, south, and east. An ornately-carved door is in the west wall.

fields.name: You are in a mine tunnel. (W)
fields.description: It looks like orcs have been here and have taken all the treasure. You see a recently dug pile of earth.

fields.name: You are in a small tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: The sides are very smooth...which rules out the possibility that this is a mine tunnel. To the north, a cave-in of soft earth blocks northern movement.

fields.name: You are in a room with an underground river. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a large room. The room has been eroded in several places by an underground river which enters from the north and continues east. The current is too swift to go north, but you could travel east if you were willing to wade through the river. A dark tunnel leads south.

fields.name: You are in the river. (E)
fields.description: The river is over your head. The current is forcing you east. There are tunnel walls (made by dwarves or the river?) to the north and south. You can only go east.

fields.name: You are at an underground lake. (D)
fields.description: You are in a huge underground lake. The water is black and very deep. You can't go west against the current, and you see no other exits.

fields.name: You are in a flooded hallway. (E/U)
fields.description: A cave-in blocks western movement. Water pours in from the ceiling. The hallway continues east. The water is about chest-high.

fields.name: You are in a flooded room. (N/E/W)
fields.description: There is a room east. The water, which is about waist deep, goes north. To the north you hear a rushing sound, and the current picks up in that direction...

fields.name: You are in a whirlpool!
fields.description: You are in a northern room. There is a great whirlpool in the room, and the water in pouring into it. So are you!

fields.name: You are at the top of some stairs. (D)
fields.description: You hear a noise coming from the bottom of the stairs.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of some stairs. (E/U)
fields.description: It is hot on this level. You see a gate to the east.

fields.name: You are at a four way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are tunnels east and west, and rooms north and south.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable living quarters. There is an exit north.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (S)
fields.description: Various useless items are scattered on the floor. There is an exit south.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable living quarters. There is an exit north.

fields.name: You are at a four way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are tunnels east and west. There are rooms north and south.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (S)
fields.description: Various useless items are scattered on the floor. There is an exit south.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable living quarters. There is an exit north.

fields.name: You are at a four way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are tunnels east and west, and there are rooms north and south.

fields.name: You are in small living quarters. (S)
fields.description: Various useless items are scattered on the floor. There is an exit south.

fields.name: You are in an east/west passage.
fields.description: The walls are very smooth and well-made here.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a tunnel west and a room east. To the north you see figures headed your way, but to the south there are no obstacles; it's almost as if the orcs know you are here and want you to go that way...

fields.name: You are in a Main Hall. (W)
fields.description: No, not THE Main Hall. It looks like there are usually lots of orcs here, but where are they now?

fields.name: You are in a dark tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: There seems to be some light north. To the south there is a four-way intersection.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/E)
fields.description: You can go east or south. You see several figures east.

fields.name: You are in a passage. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable tunnel. There is a slight red glow to the east.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: To the far east you see a bend in the tunnel. There is a red glow coming from that direction.

fields.name: You are at a bend. (E/W)
fields.description: You are at a bend in the passage. The tunnel goes west and a crack through the floor is to the east. On the other side, the tunnel continues. You see a red glow east.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: There is a bend to the west and a crack in the floor. To the south, you see light and feel heat.

fields.name: You are in a large room. (N/E)
fields.description: You are in the northern end of a large hall. To the east you see a dark, deep chasm with a narrow bridge spanning it. You are cut off from a tunnel south by a crack which runs east and west across the room. Flames erupt from the crack.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: To the north is a four way intersection. To the south there is a very faint light.

fields.name: You are at a bend. (N/E)
fields.description: You see a red glow at the east end of the tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a passage. (E/W)
fields.description: There is a slight red glow to the east.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You see a bend in the tunnel to the east and a red glow reflecting off the south wall. It is hot here, and you feel it getting hotter to the east. You see no orcs east, but you here them coming from the west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (N/W)
fields.description: To the north, you see light and feel heat, but there are no obstacles to stop you from going that way. You hear noises coming from the west.

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: You see light north and a bend in the tunnel to the south. It is very hot here.

fields.name: You are in a large room.
fields.description: You are in the south end of a large room. A deep crack runs across the room, cutting you off from a tunnel to the north and a bridge to the east. A fire erupts from the crack. An army of orcs and trolls blocks off the south.

fields.name: You are on the bridge of Khazad-Dum. (E)
fields.description: You are on a long, narrow bridge. It's hard to see everything because the deep chasm underneath you is very dark. The bridge is cracked and it looks like a sudden burst of force might destroy it. To the east there is a faint light.

fields.name: You are in a large hall. (E/W)
fields.description: To the west a bridge crosses into darkness, while to the east you see East-gate.

fields.name: You are at East-Gate. (N/W)
fields.description: You are out of Moria! You can go west into a large hall, or north along a path down the mountain. To the east and south there are cliff edges.

fields.name: You are at a dead end on a mountain path. (S/D)
fields.description: You are on a path going down the mountain. To the south lies East-Gate. To the west there is a cliff wall, and to the east there is a cliff edge. The path has been washed out to the north, making this a dead end.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of the Misty Mountains. (E/U)
fields.description: You see handholds going up. Large boulders stop you from going north or south. There is a forest east.

fields.name: You are in the forest. (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a path in the forest. Thick brush prevents north or south movement. A path runs east and west.

fields.name: You are in an elf village. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large square. You can go north to what looks like a tavern. To the south you see a small house. To the east...? There are elves running all over the place -- but then again, it's their village.

fields.name: You are in the Captain's house. (N)
fields.description: You are in the living quarters of the Captain of the Elf Guard.

fields.name: You are in a tavern. (S)
fields.description: There are lots of elves here, partying and having a good time. You talk with them and they notice you are weary. They give you a drink.

fields.name: You are in the Field of Galadriel. (W)
fields.description: You are in a whimsical green field.

fields.name: You are in a side chamber. (N)
fields.description: There is a hole (too small for you to fit through) in the floor. There's also a lot of garbage on the floor.

fields.name: You are in the elevator at the top of stairs. (D)
fields.description: Outside the elevator door, there is a stairway going down deep into the ground.

fields.name: You are falling down a pit!
fields.description: You are in a small, dark room. It is very hot in here. There is a large pit in the room. You'll be thinking about it a lot during the fifteen-mile drop to the bottom!

fields.name: You are in a tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: There is a gate south. You see a light north.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a tunnel south. To the east and west there are small chambers.

fields.name: You are in a small prison cell. (E)
fields.description: There are chains and torture equipment lying around. There is an exit east.

fields.name: You are in a small prison cell. (W)
fields.description: There are chains and torture equipment lying around. There is an exit west.

fields.name: You are on the old road.
fields.description: You have run into a gang of thieves. There are far too many to fight. You are able to take out a couple, but soon you are overwhelmed! They strip you of all your possessions, then take turns beating you up until you lose consciousness.

fields.name: You are on a plateau. (E)
fields.description: You see a door appear on the cliff wall. Slowly it opens to reveal a stairway going down into darkness. Suddenly, you see black tentacles come out of the pool! They block the western path and push you east!

fields.name: You are in a secret room. (E/W) [unused]
fields.description: A secret door has opened to the west! You can go that way or east.

fields.name: You are in the forest. (E/W) [unused]
fields.description: The gate to the east is now open. You can go east or west.

fields.name: You are a small, square room. (S)
fields.description: You are in a small, square room. There is no furniture. There is some machinery on the walls, but you can't tell what it does. Near the wall is a crack in the floor, which goes all the way around the room. Through it, you can see the darkness deeper in the mines.

fields.name: You are in a mine tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a disused mine tunnel running north and south. You see only darkness in both directions, but there is the sound of running water to the north. Inch-deep puddles of water dot the stone floor.

fields.name: scimitar
fields.description: You see a long, black scimitar with bits of flesh hanging on to it.

fields.name: orc bow
fields.description: You see the orc's bow.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a long, black sword.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see a small battle axe that a moment ago was meant to sever your body parts from you.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see the Sergeant's mace.

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see the archer's bow.

fields.name: longsword
fields.description: You see the Lieutenant's longsword.

fields.name: large club
fields.description: You see the troll's very large club.

fields.name: funny-looking bow
fields.description: You see a funny-looking bow.

fields.name: SkullCleaver
fields.description: You see a wicked battle axe that was used by Azog. Its name is SkullCleaver.

fields.name: desk
fields.description: You see a desk in the center of the room.

fields.name: staff
fields.description: You see a staff. It looks like a giant match.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: You see a large silver key.

fields.name: oak box
fields.description: You see a small locked box made of oak.

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: You see a small pile of diamonds.

fields.name: gate
fields.description: You see a large strong gate. It has thick steel bars and a small lock.

fields.name: orc-brew
fields.description: You see a black potion. It smells very strange. The lieutenant was handling it carefully, as if he didn't want it to spill. (And get on him and poison him? Or spill out, so he'd have less healing potion?)

fields.name: Durin's axe
fields.description: You see a beautifully-made large mithril axe. On the handle, the words "Durin the Deathless" are written.

fields.name: letter
fields.description: You see the letter that the bartender gave you.

fields.name: pile of treasure
fields.description: You see a huge pile of treasure that the dragon was sitting on!

fields.name: gold key
fields.description: You see a large, heavy gold key lying among the trash.

fields.name: gate
fields.description: You see a large, well-reinforced gate. It has three-inch gold bars and a heavy steel lock.

fields.name: precious gems
fields.description: You see a small pile of precious gems!!

fields.name: Arkenstone
fields.description: You see a beautiful jewel. Even in the dim light it sparkles with brilliant radiance, and seems to shine with its own inner light. It must be the Arkenstone, a treasure cut by dwarves long ago.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see a bag full of gold!

fields.name: necklace
fields.description: You see a diamond necklace!

fields.name: mithril key
fields.description: You see a large mithril key.

fields.name: mithril gate
fields.description: You see a strong gate. It's made of mithril, so you can forget about trying to break it!

fields.name: pure lembas
fields.description: You see a small piece of bread.

fields.name: mithril box
fields.description: You see a large mithril box.

fields.name: bound wizard
fields.description: You see an old man wearing a funny hat and tattered grey robes. He has long white hair. He is chained to the wall using thick, magic-resistant iron chains.

fields.name: bound dwarf
fields.description: You see a short, hairy man. He is wearing tarnished chain mail. He is chained to the wall.

fields.name: mining tools
fields.description: You see some old, beat-up mining tools.

fields.name: pillar
fields.description: You see a pillar in the center of the room. A light runs through it and out a hole in the top of the pillar. At the top you see a mold-like depression in the shape of a small object.

fields.name: wood carving
fields.description: You see a beautiful wood carving.

fields.name: lever
fields.description: Inside a box on the wall is a lever. It seems to be connected to the machinery in here.

fields.name: keyhole
fields.description: You see a keyhole in the wall.

fields.name: door
fields.description: You realize that the cliff is a wall and find an outline of a door! You also see writing on the door.

fields.name: spiked mace
fields.description: You see Hank's large, spiked mace.

fields.name: words
fields.description: A beam of light runs through the pillar, out of the mold, and through the Arkenstone! The room is filled with lights of various and changing colors! Words appear on the western wall!

fields.name: lever
fields.description: You see the lever. If you USE it, the elevator will raise.

fields.name: board
fields.description: You see the word, "DANGER", written across it in orcish. It has a couple of rusty nails sticking out of it.

fields.name: large gate
fields.description: A large gate blocks the passage east.

fields.name: statue of Durin
fields.description: You see a statue of a mighty-looking dwarf with a long beard.

fields.name: orc skeletons
fields.description: Several orc skeletons lie on the floor here. Many of the bones are broken.

fields.text: It says all that garbage that you read before, plus a strange word: ELBERETH

He gives you a little piece of bread. He says it is pure lembas (to be distinguished from "lembas"), and that it does strange things depending on the person who uses it, sometimes bad, sometimes good.
She smiles and says, "It is good that you came. I see you are weary and wish to return to your home." She says some words and you find yourself outside the Main Hall.
It says, "Who disturbs the sleep of Durin the deathless? Speak NOW and enter!"
You see some strange symbols, and a sentence. It says, "Speak, MY FRIEND, and enter!" followed by the word "Khazad-Dum".
You feel the room start to move. You're going down!
You feel the room start to move. You're going up!
In a frantic attempt to escape, you try to jump across the chasm! You miss the other side and fall! You're burned to death before you reach the bottom!
A swirling wind surrounds you, beating dust into your eyes. You can't see. Then it is suddenly quiet.
There is deafening clap of thunder, a storm of dust, and a flash of light! Suddenly a rock appears above your head and lands on it with a CLUNK! OUCH!!!

He sees that you do not have any precious gems (which he loves) and says he is saving his "prized possession" for someone who has some. Still, because of your deeds, he gives you a beautiful wood carving.
The balrog dodges out of the way and your magic blast smashes into the bridge! The bridge collapses and the balrog falls into the chasm!
The gate is locked and it is too large to even think of trying to force open. You see no keyhole on it, but when you know you hear somebody on the other side yell, "What's the password?"

You see a burst of light as a very handsome face made of flames appears above you; you can't help but notice it is wearing a silly pirate hat as well. It speaks, "Yarr! I, the creator of Eamon Deluxe, can defeat this Sam Ruby witchcraft for ye!"
The flames suddenly engulf the entire room, although you can't feel it at all, and burn up all but five of the army ants!
A secret door has opened to the west!
The gate to the east swings open!
You see the stone statue come alive!
You hear a loud sonic boom which echoes through the tunnels. The noise seems to have attracted some unwanted attention!
You fell through a trap door and landed in a pit!
As you insert the key, a secret panel opens up and reveals a lever!
Gimli says, "I can't believe it! This is the tomb of Durin the Deathless, the Dwarven king who built these mines."

fields.name: Galadriel
fields.description: You see a tall, beautiful elvish woman. She says she is Galadriel, Queen of Lothlorien (this forest), and she wants to know what you are doing here.

fields.name: orc swordsman
fields.description: You see an orc wielding a large scimitar.

fields.name: orc bowman
fields.description: You see an orc loading his bow and aiming it at you.

fields.name: orc
fields.description: You see a plain old, sorry-looking orc.

fields.name: orc sergeant
fields.description: You see an orc sergeant, yelling at his men to remove some of your vital organs!

fields.name: orc sergeant
fields.description: You see an orc Sergeant, taking out his mace and preparing for some "bashin' and smashin'."

fields.name: orc archer
fields.description: You see an orc archer, ready to use you as target practice.

fields.name: Uruk Hai lieutenant
fields.description: You see a tall orc, who looks different than the other orcs. He must be a "Uruk Hai", Sauron's superior orc breed. He has the symbol of a Lieutenant on his shield.

fields.name: grey spider
fields.description: You see a large, grey spider staring at you with red eyes.

fields.name: black spider
fields.description: You see a large black spider.

fields.name: giant spider
fields.description: You see a giant spider, rapidly descending upon you.

fields.name: troll
fields.description: You see a tall, man-like figure. If you call twelve feet tall man-like. His green, plate-mail-like skin identifies him as a troll!

fields.name: Uruk Hai guard
fields.description: You see two Uruk Hai guards, who turn away from their captive to deal with you.

fields.name: Gandalf
fields.description: You see an old man wearing a funny hat. He has long, white hair and wears torn grey robes. He is muttering about how a ranger escaped and was not able to free "poor old Gandalf".
fields.combat_verbs: conjures fire at,swings at,shoots lightning at

fields.name: guard
fields.description: You see two orc guards, who aren't about to let their prisoner get away with you.

fields.name: Gimli
fields.description: You see a dwarf wearing tarnished chain mail. He picks up an axe and says, "Let us go now and find some orcs' necks to cleave."

fields.name: army ant
fields.description: You see an ant crawl out of a hole, then another... And another... And another..... And another.... And another... And even more......

fields.name: giant bat
fields.description: You see a giant black bat hovering above you.

fields.name: giant boa
fields.description: You see a giant boa, which jumps up and attempts to squeeze the life out of you.

fields.name: giant rattler
fields.description: You see a giant rattle snake, which is coiling for a strike....

fields.name: giant cobra
fields.description: You see a giant cobra, waiting to fill you with its venom.

fields.name: dragon
fields.description: You see a huge dragon. Its red scales look like they could handle the toughest blade.
fields.combat_verbs: breathes fire at,claws at,tries to incinerate

fields.name: fire lizard
fields.description: You see a big lizard with fire-red skin.

fields.name: giant lizard
fields.description: You see a giant lizard, ready to rip you to pieces with his claws.

fields.name: killer lizard
fields.description: You see a very mean-looking lizard. He's a killer (literally).

fields.name: kraken
fields.description: You see several long, black, slimy tentacles reaching above the surface, grabbing you, and pulling you under.

fields.name: shark
fields.description: You see a sinister fin rising above the water. It's coming at you fast!

fields.name: statue of Durin
fields.description: The statue of the legendary Dwarf king, Durin the Deathless, is alive. It is a well-crafted replica of the real thing.

fields.name: Blok
fields.description: You see a run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Glok
fields.description: You see another run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Dok
fields.description: You see another run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Dreck
fields.description: You see a run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Heck
fields.description: You see another run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Placke
fields.description: You see another run-of-the-mill orc.

fields.name: Olog Hai troll
fields.description: You see a troll with black skin. It is an "Olog Hai" troll, one of Sauron's elite, superior trolls.

fields.name: Olog Hai troll
fields.description: You see a troll with black skin. It is an "Olog Hai" troll, one of Sauron's elite, superior trolls.

fields.name: Jack
fields.description: You see a Uruk Hai orc with a Captain's badge on his armor. He says his name is Jack and you are gonna be put in a sack.

fields.name: Mack
fields.description: You see an Uruk Hai orc with a Captain's badge on his armor. He says his name is Mack and you are gonna be put in a sack.

fields.name: Olog
fields.description: You see an Olog Hai troll. He was about to eat an orc but he sees some fresh meat entering the room instead...

fields.name: Uruk
fields.description: You see an Uruk Hai orc. He was going to have a quiet lunch, but now he has a better idea...

fields.name: Vampire
fields.description: You see a dark figure. It has bat-like wings with talons at the edges. It is vaguely man-shaped. Its red eyes are staring you down. It is an evil beast from ages past, a dark messenger from the dark years... A vampire!

fields.name: Clumsy
fields.description: You see a funny-looking orc. He doesn't look too bright. That's because he isn't. You can tell because he has his bow loaded backwards.

fields.name: orc patrolman
fields.description: You see a surprised orc, saying something about how you were supposed to be trapped on the other side. "It won't matter much longer," he says, taking out his axe!

fields.name: orc patrolman
fields.description: You see another orc patrollman. He simply loads his bow.

fields.name: Hank
fields.description: You see a huge troll who must be fifteen feet tall! He says his name is Hank and that up 'til now it was a boring day.

fields.name: Azog
fields.description: You see a proud orc blocking the east tunnel. He holds a large battle axe. He says, "I am Azog, Lord of Moria, and you will go no further."

fields.name: giant worm
fields.description: You see a ten-foot long worm. It looks sickening, with its white puffy skin and slobbering mouth.

fields.name: balrog
fields.description: You see a man-shaped shadow. It seems to be shifting. It has large wings and scares the heck out of you. It uses a long red flame as a sword. It is your worst nightmare, a balrog! No wonder the dwarves had to leave!

fields.name: elf captain
fields.description: You talk with the Captain, and he is amazed by your tale. He offers to exchange gifts with you (an elvish custom).

fields.name: orc
fields.description: A group of orcs in full battle gear come charging down the tunnels!
